parameters.query:
=INSERT INTO exchange_rates (
  branch,
  tbc_return_rate,
  raw_data
) VALUES (
  'tbc',
  {{ $json.tbc_return_rate || 'NULL' }},
  '{{ ($json.raw_data || '{}').replace(/'/g, "''") }}'
)
RETURNING *

=INSERT INTO events (
  type,
  event_name,
  ok,
  reason,
  processed
) VALUES (
  'tbc.return_rate.parse.failed',
  'tbc.return_rate.parse.failed',
  FALSE,
  '{{ ($json.error || 'Unknown error').replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  TRUE
)
